resources:
ZikoBot
Loading..
Start <--> With me, your alarm clock is more friendly, I program my favorite music! I need that you connect to your Spotify® or Deezer® account (requires a premium account) With your permission, I can also access my music stored locally on your phone.
Nice to meet you, I am Zikobot, your musical assistant! Combines your musical accounts No account? No problem for me! Done Skip
You can create playlists by browsing the music on your phone, or your different musical accounts. Use the 3 dots menu ;) Supports here to add my favorite songs You are logged out! Fix this here
Menu <--> About Make an alarm Add after current playing track Add at the end of current playing track See the artist page delete See guitar tab network
Add all
Titles <--> My personal music My accounts
Create a new playlist Select the hour
Playlist title Name error Select your track Music choice
MON TUE WED THU FRI SAT SUN Schedule
Activity Wake Up <--> Stop
Connect to spotify Connection
ActivityMusic<-->
You can manage your alarm right here Alarm at : Validate %d tracks track(s)
Coming soon... Play alarm
Sorry I did not find any music on your phone I need you to add songs to start the alarm I need your permission to access your music :) Click here to give me this power ! album(s) Random mode Volume
SoundCloud Connect to SoundCloud Spotify Soundcloud Account Type : Spotify
Music Alarm Select your playlist Sorry, you have no Premium account ... I can not use Spotify without it :( Oops Sorry I do not handle that format yet :( Edition
Next alarm : No alarm Click here to add No active alarms Click here to prepare Zikentifier
true true Zikobot, Android musical assistant settings Cancel Your playlist have been deleted Settings Add to a playlist Add to current music Your playlist has been updated Activate the alarm mode to update it Sorry, I did not find any results :( Informations Tu as besoin d\'un compte Spotify Premium :( Une erreur est survenue lors de la lecture de la piste Oops spotify m\'indique cette chanson est corrompue :s No data, check your connection Handle phone call (this will pause the music when you receive a phone call) Error while trying to download, please retry. It may be possible this file cannot be downloaded… Your song has been downloaded It\'s here I can manage your music accounts ! Don\'t worry I only keep the necessary to play music You are a Spotify user? No problem! ( You will need premium to play music ) Select the Spotify playlists you want to synchronize Oh you do not have any playlist yet ? :( You can import some from your accounts or create from scratch. It is right there ! Tu n\'es pas connecté à Spotify, clique ici pour régler ça !
